byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Michael S. Schmidt, Jeremy W. Peters, Adam Goldman, Matt Apuzzo, Eric Lichtblau and Adam Liptak.
byline.original: By JULIE HIRSCHFELD DAVIS and MICHAEL D. SHEAR

abstract: Pres-elect Donald Trump, during interview with New York Times reporters and editors, says he has no intention of prosecuting Hillary Clinton for use of private email server or financial operations of her family foundation; statement represents striking reversal given prominence of such claims during presidential campaign and angers some Trump supporters.
lead_paragraph: “Lock her up”? The president-elect signaled that he would prefer to move on rather than pursue inquiries into Mrs. Clinton’s email use and the Clinton Foundation.
snippet: “Lock her up”? The president-elect signaled that he would prefer to move on rather than pursue inquiries into Mrs. Clinton’s email use and the Clinton Foundation....

headline.main: Donald Trump Drops Threat of New Hillary Clinton Investigation
headline.print_headline: Donald Trump Drops Threat of New Hillary Clinton Investigation
